title: First timing champs in flex
body:
In the last game of my promos to plat 3, I decided to first time Evelyn jg since I figured, statistically, I was about to be paired with a group of monkies and we were going to lose anyways.

Are my claims unfounded? Perhaps not. A couple games ago I had a silver v in my game.  

Needless to say my eve gameplay sucked and I went 1-10 not knowing how to play her effectively. But you know what? Fuckkit. Riots algos in flex are so imbalanced there's really no point in treating this boosted queue as srsly as solo/duo. I'd rather wait in a 20 minute queue and match with people on my skill level than waste 40 minutes playing a losing game that's based on luck  on who you get matched with (and how far their skill level differs). 

Tl;dr: riot sucks at math. Flex queue is so boosted there's no point in treating it competitively as if it were different from normals.

replies.body: If you were in a region where they disabled normal draft, this is excusable behavior. Given that you seem to be playing on NA you are acting like a spoiled brat who feels entitled to ruin other peoples games/fun because of how you perceive something they have no control over. Grow up mate.
Top ranked challenger in flex is gold v solo/duo. :thinking:
